facial_expressions.description: Uplifted corners of the mouth, often showing teeth, conveying happiness or friendliness.
Downward turning of the corners of the mouth, indicating sadness, disapproval, or concentration.
Raised eyebrows, wide-open eyes, and a slightly open mouth, indicating shock or astonishment.
Furrowed brows, narrowed eyes, and a tight or downturned mouth, conveying irritation or rage.
A focused or distant gaze, often with a hand on the chin, indicating contemplation or deep thought.
One eyebrow raised higher than the other, sometimes with a slight smirk, indicating doubt or disbelief.
Slight downward turn of the mouth, sometimes with a slight furrow of the brow, conveying disappointment or sorrow.
A light smile with crinkled eyes, indicating mild amusement or pleasure.
